# SingleStoreAttributeCollection indexer

Gets the attribute at the specified index.

```csharp
public SingleStoreAttribute this[int index] { get; }
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| index | The index. |

## Return Value

The [`SingleStoreAttribute`](../SingleStoreAttribute.md) at that index.
